sect1.title: $compile_dir
sect1.para: This is the name of the directory where compiled templates are located. By default this is "./templates_c", meaning that it will look for the compile directory in the same directory as the executing php script. This directory must be writeable by the web server. See also $use_sub_dirs.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: This setting must be either a relative or absolute path. include_path is not used for writing files.

note.title: Technical Note
note.para: It is not recommended to put this directory under the web server document root.
